Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees will send a hot-hitting Jazz Chisholm to the plate against the Chicago Cubs and Dansby Swanson, who has been on a tear in recent games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees average 1.5 home runs per game and have hit a league-leading 213 home runs in total.
The Cubs' 149 home runs rank 19th in Major League Baseball.
